channel.title: Music on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Music on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: today of all days
item.description: today was pretty fun. I worked. wore a tie. etc etc. it was nifty. and now I am really pretty tired. I need to get off of this crazy crazy schedule. I really dispise and hate it. i picked up an airport express. it is relly pretty cool. I like what I am abl eto do with it. especially the streaming of music. that is really really cool. I can’t really think of anything cooler.

item.title: king diamond rules.
item.description: seriously.. awesome.. you should check it out. herei am currently listening to kind diamond and lali puna on shuffle.balthus spooks me out.i need to get SOOOO much work done. it sucks. but I am trucking. weird how things go well.. then go bad… then go well.. etc etc rinse repeat. whatever

item.title: music
item.description: Check out this site and then buy a bunch of music there. It rules. Today was out of control. I worked a lot.. but I didn’t feel like I got much done. I don’t know why. it is so weird. I am all hopped up. tomorrow my mother, aunt and cousin come to visit. it will be fun. I am a bit worried about entertaining a younger person. I only know bars.
